author: Dominic-Stafford
body: Update gosam-contrib to version 2018.07.08. This updates a number of subpackages, most relevant being updating ninja from version 1.0 to 1.1, which is necessary for building external madgraph gridpacks against this library. Tested with a cmsdist build for 12_4_X, including linking the madgraph gridpacks against this
title: Update gosamcontrib version
